bitesize.line1: Born and raised in Wales, the land of dragons
bitesize.line2: Fluent in both Welsh and English
bitesize.line3: Graduated from Cardiff University with a Bachelor of Science in Mathematics and its Applications degree in 2013
bitesize.line4: Transitioned from developing standalone applications to full stack web development

techstack.description: I’ve used a lot of different technologies during my time as a developer. Here's what I enjoy the most and use on a day-to-day basis.

frontend.heading: Frontend
frontend.description: I take a lot of pride in creating accessible applications; the web is for everyone.

backend.heading: Backend
backend.description: I value clean and modular design with a focus on code reuse and readability.

devops.heading: DevOps
devops.description: I try to make the developer experience for deploying code as seamless as possible.

sport.heading: Sport
sport.description: I like lots of different sports

resume.heading: Check out my professional résumé
resume.subheading: You'll find my relevant skills, work experience and more

description.heading: Résumé

paragraph.line1: I wanted somewhere accessible to keep my generic résumé and what better place than on my own website! For certain applications I may tailor it to suit the role but a lot of the core information remains the same.

description.info: I want to stress that this is purely a 2 page format. It’s intended as an overview and to encourage discussions.

formats.heading: Alternative Formats
formats.paragraph: You can find alternative formats of my cv below

word.title: Microsoft Word
word.description: This is a description for the word document

contact.heading: Feel free to send me a message
contact.subheading: Sometimes the old school ways are the best

description.heading: Email me
description.paragraph: If you'd like to chat about a project, a potential job opportunity, or just anything in general really, then please fill in the form below and I'll do my best to respond within 1-2 days.

form.success: Yay, your message has been sent!

snackbar.error: Message failed. Please try again in 5 seconds.

footer.tagline: Designing and developing full stack software solutions that are responsive and accessible.
